Player History
Injured on 7/9/1965 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/23/1966, off John Purdin (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/15/1967, off Dick Kelley (ATL)...
Won World Series with San Francisco in 1967...
Injured on 8/13/1969 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 1970 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Cincinnati on 4/5/1971...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/6/1972, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
Won World Series with San Francisco in 1973...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Cincinnati on 6/25/1976...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Had 6 hits with 5 RBI against Cincinnati on 5/18/1977...

Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Shortstop in 1977...
